title: Erigon eth_blockNumber stuck at 0xe4e1bf
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon version 2.28.1-dev-adf5fc7b

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour

Giving correct eth_blockNumber after sync

#### Actual behaviour
returning 0xe4e1bf for blockNumber (14999999)

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Sync erigon with prysm, prysm fully synced, erigon too. Now it is stuck at headers.
